content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>Finding Augustine</ShortName>   <Description>Library Catalog Search</Description>   <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/png">http://www.findingaugustine.org/vufind-favicon.png</Image>   <Contact>support@findingaugustine.org</Contact>   <Url type="text/html" method="get" template="http://www.findingaugustine.org/Search/Results?lookfor={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}"/>   <Url type="application/rss+xml" method="get" template="http://www.findingaugustine.org/Search/Results?lookfor={searchTerms}&view=rss"/>   <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" method="get" template="http://www.findingaugustine.org/Search/Suggest?lookfor={searchTerms}&format=JSON"/> </OpenSearchDescription>
